item.description:
I'm changing this to the March 27 date because I want to go to the Mt. Auburn event on April 3.

Opera in Cinema Series:

http://www.operaincin...

Showtime is 11am: March 27, Carmen, Each HD screening is $20

You need to purchase tickets in advance with the link below, call the theater if you have questions. I'm allowing Maybe RSVPs, but after you purchase your ticket, please change your RSVP to Yes or I will assume you're not coming. Thanks.

I will be in the lobby around 10:30 am and hang out there for ten minutes or so.

Choose the date on THIS PAGE to purchase tickets!
http://www.ticketmake...

Several popular bus routes stop directly in front of the theater, including the 77 bus.

For those of you driving, there is street parking in the area.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture and will be in the lobby at 10:30 am
item.name: Opera in Cinema: Carmen at the Capitol Theatre in Arlington
